name: Re-Block
description: A game made for the 2020.2 brackeys game jam. You're this cube that's skipping from level so you need to be sharp and alert and time your jumps properly.  press R to rewind to avoid dying before a crucial moment because if you die you go back to level 1. It took 4 days to make this so there's still some features missing that i'll add in the future. It simple , fun by mostly frustrating game. Enjoy
